description: This Java source file defines a Spring configuration class 'CorsConfig' that registers a global Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) filter for the backend application. The filter allows cross-origin requests from specified frontend URLs, which can be configured via an environment variable or defaults to common development ports.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that sets up a global CORS filter allowing cross-origin requests from specified frontend URLs.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates and registers a CorsFilter bean which applies to all application paths and allows configured origins and methods.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Defines a bean that configures and returns a CorsFilter object, setting allowed origins (from environment variable or defaults) and permitted headers/methods.
